data.title: La Fabbrica 2013 : Jacques Doillon
data.text:
LA FABBRICA

La Fabbrica welcomes an experienced filmmaker who has contributed to the development of cinematic modernity and explores his work as a director, by giving him the opportunity to comment on his films alongside his artistic collaborators, including actors, the director of photography, sound engineers, editors…

Jacques Doillon

This year, Jacques Doillon takes pride of place. He will be present throughout a retrospective encompassing a dozen of his films. As his latest, refreshingly free-spirited creation, Mes séances de lutte, appears in cinemas, EntreVues looks back on his sometimes unappreciated œuvre, which began some 40 years ago.

The films :

Les doigts dans la tête, 1974

Un sac de billes, 1975

La Drôlesse, 1979

La Femme qui pleure, 1979

La Vie de famille, 1985

Comédie !, 1987

La Vengeance d’une femme, 1990

Ponette, 1996 + Jouer Ponette de Jeanne Crépeau

Carrément à l’ouest, 2001

Raja, 2003

Le Premier Venu, 2008

Mes séances de lutte, 2013

The "Fabbrica" meetings :

Le Premier Venu, followed by a discussion with Jacques Doillon and Frédéric Fichefet, editor.

Ponette, followed by discussion with Jacques Doillon, Caroline Champetier, director of photography, Victoire Thivisol, Ponette's performer and Jean-Claude Laureux, sound engineer.

Jouer Ponette by Jeanne Crépeau, followed by a discussion with Jacques Doillon, Jeanne Crépeau and Victoire Thivisol, Ponette's performer.

Raja, followed by a discussion with Jacques Doillon, Pascal Greggory, actor and Lola Doillon, assistant director on this movie.
